pos review: The breakfast was simple but good . Location was good but i felt little scary at times
neg review: The shower situation was really really bad. They need to change it ..

pos review: Clean big rooms great breakfast and nice stuffs.
breakfast was great and felt that the hostel was super modern. Well designed.
neg review: the size of the lockers were a bit tricky, it didn't fit my bag but other than that i was great.

pos review: Everything was good - nice room with a desk, clean, with perfect location, easy check-in.
neg review: The only missing thing in this hostel is some kind of a kitchen that could be used by guests (to make a tea or a sandwitch).

pos review: If you reserve early enough, you will get a fantastic double-bed room on the 4th floor!!

neg review: Noise from outside when you open your window.

pos review: Very decent hostel in the Brussels city center.
